p: While two or more MC articles may have unique MC article identifiers, inspection of the URL and article title indicate that they are indeed the same. By way of example, consider the following MC articles: the first is http://www.nytimes.com/2016/05/20/science/exxon-mobil-climate-change-global-warming.html?partner=rss&emc=rss, with MC title State Officials Investigated Over Their Inquiry Into Exxon Mobil’s Climate Change Research and MC unique identifier 468593919 (the unicode HTML encoding for the apostrophe (') symbol is intentionally left uncleaned in order to illustrate challenges in excess of simple string matching); and the second is http://www.nytimes.com/2016/05/20/science/exxon-mobil-climate-change-global-warming.html, with MC title State Officials Investigated Over Their Inquiry Into Exxon Mobil’s Climate Change Research and MC unique identifier 468588600.
